entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Manicouagan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac Manouane East 08:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: -7.6°C
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -7.9°C
Wind: ESE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow or freezing rain. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of freezing rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of rain after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
